name: Quantitative Trading Strategies -- Finding an edge
description: Discussing various ways users can find an edge (and make $!) trading crypto.  Pitfalls to avoid, unique insights into crypto specific markets and themes, and realistic case studies.  All from a veteran trader (10+ years experience across a variety of markets).

speakers.name: Chris Barnes
speakers.bio: CEO of crypto prop trading firm.  Passionate about extracting value from markets.
